comment: Just got back from a two-day trip to the Kansas City area where I bought a large x Church building of over sq ft. Regrettably I rented it out to a bad renter who let his dogs shit in the building, took one of the doors off the hinges broke windows. So today I bought tools, locks and plywood,fixed the door & hinges, changed the locks, boarded up windows
